statements: DELETE FROM food_distribution WHERE quantity < 10 AND distribution_date < '2021-08-15';
DELETE FROM food_distribution_centers WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM food_distribution_records WHERE quantity < 10 AND center_id IN (SELECT id FROM food_distribution_centers WHERE location = 'New York');
DELETE FROM food_distribution_records WHERE distributed_date < '2022-01-01' AND center_id = (SELECT id FROM food_distribution_centers WHERE center_name = 'Central Depot');
DELETE FROM DistributionRecord WHERE food_item_id = 3 AND date_time < '2023-01-01';
